item.title: Baylor Scott & White Hospital Brenham medical malpractice attorney/lawyer
item.description: As a Houston, Texas medical malpractice attorney, I handle cases involving medical and healthcare mistakes throughout the State of Texas, including the Brenham area. Baylor Scott & White Hospital Brenham is located at 700 Medical Pkwy, Brenham, TX 7783. It is a 60-bed acute care hospital that offers healthcare to patients in Washington, Austin, Burleson, Colorado, Fayette, Grimes, Lee and Waller counties. The hospital offers services in areas including breast imaging, oral surgery, diabetes care, ear, nose and throat (ENT), optometry/ophthalmology, foot care and podiatry, cardiac/heart/vascular, diagnostic imaging and radiology, men’s health, orthopedic surgery, pain management, pediatrics, primary care, sports medicine, urology, and women’s health.
